title: 24 Hours Lyrics Yuvan Yuvathi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song : 24 Hours 
Singer: Haricharan
Lyrics: Annamalai 
MOvie: Yuvan Yuvathi
Music : Vijay Antony

[Hands up every body hands up - aai
Hands up every body hands up ] (2)

Comein dance on you offi dance up
When you hear the music on you, put your hands up
Are you steady gonsup and put your hands up
Everybody ..... put them hands up

Adra .....
24 manineram, ilamaiku ingae podhaadhu
America ponna paathale, ada namma ooru pudikaathu
Azhaginga ulagam idhuvaachu, palagida thudikum permoochu
Anukunda thooki poottalum, Ivalunga aatam adangaadhu

Hands up every body hands up -aai
Hands up every body hands up

Inbam thaedum paruvam, paduthum pengam vuruvam
Time bomb pole idhayam ivalungalale vedikum
Vazhkai ingae varavu, venaam saami thuravu
Light illamal uravu,meendum meendum iravu

Hands up every body hands up ....
24 manineram, ilamaiku ingae podhaadhu
America ponna paathale, ada namma ooru pudikaathu
Adra .....

Coffee-ya kudi, nee paatu padi,
Manasuku pudichatha nee senju mudi
Vaangidu adi, vaanathu idi
Thaangida thaangida aagu ready

Hands up every body hands up ....
Vazhvathu varam, koothadu manam
Ovvoru thaedhiyum valiba dhinam
Manasoru kudam, verum kaali idam
Athu romba vadiyattum thaedu sugam

Netru Naalai ellaaame kanavu,
Istam pole indru vazhada
Odum naatkal, ottum nam pozhudhai
Thallaadum mun Job thaedada

24 manineram ......
Hands up every body hands up ...
Hands up every body hands up - aai
Hands up every body hands up

Platina sillai, vizhi veesum valai
Paarvayil podhayil suthudhu thalai
Anukathir ulai, soodethum alai
seiyuthu seiyuthu uyirai kolai

Sikkena udai, kikana idai 
idhayathai thaakura athiradai padai
Mounathai udai, aasaiku thadai
Kangalil kangalil podu edai..

Poo pookamal kaikaikum azhagu
paarkum podhe, kanna kothuthe
Vendam podhum endraalum valarum 
Meesai pole Aasai neeluthe

24 manineram, ilamaiku ingae podhaadhu
America ponna paathale, ada namma ooru pudikaathu
Azhaginga ulagam idhuvaachu,palagida thudikum permoochu
Anukunda thooki poottalum, Ivalunga aatam adangaadhu

Hands up every body hands up - aai
